thread.title: Toyota partners with MIT and Stanford to see how AI can make driving safer
thread.title_full: Toyota partners with MIT and Stanford to see how AI can make driving safer - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Toyota partners with MIT and Stanford to see how AI can make driving safer
text: Toyota today announced that it has formed partnerships with Stanford University and the Massachusetts Institute of Technology to open joint research center on both of those U.S. campuses. Researchers there will focus on artificial intelligence and robotics — but not in the same way that other automakers have been doing in recent years. The immediate […] »
